name: To The Tower
description:
Deep in the heart of a dying kingdom, a hero yearns for a call of adventure. Lured to the cursed land by the promise of uncovering the secret of an ancient structure, the Tower of Latvia. His perilous adventure takes him to the foot of a mountain named Storms End, where he embarks on his adventure to uncover what dwells inside the tower.

Controls:

A - Move Left

D - Move Right

Spacebar - Jump

Spacebar 2x - Double Jump

Shift+A/D - Sprint

Shift+Spacebar - Boost Jump
